backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report placeholder listing no features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Deployment checklist verifying the 5‑step Valentine flow and interactive features work correctly.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Renders the ValentineProposalFlow as the root component.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Confetti: Generates 100 falling confetti elements and cleans them up after animation.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Floating: Continuously spawns floating heart emojis that rise and auto-remove.
frontend/src/features/valentine/hooks/us: Manages three memory images with upload, reset, and localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/At: Intro step with attention message and button to proceed.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/Fi: Final step showing YES/NO buttons, moving NO button, confetti, and response messages.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/He: Greeting step explaining effort behind the website with a button to continue.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/Le: Letter-style message step building anticipation before the question.
frontend/src/features/valentine/steps/Me: Displays three memory cards with image upload/reset and persistent storage.
frontend/src/features/valentine/Valentin: Centered layout wrapper applying fade-in animation to children.
Controls the 5‑step Valentine flow, switching steps and showing background hearts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, storing identity state, and exposing login/clear helpers with status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and custom animations like floating hearts, confetti fall, and fade‑in.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, content scanning, theme extensions, custom colors mapped to CSS variables, and extra animations and utilities.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, requirements, and issues for building a romantic multi-step Valentine proposal site with animations and interactions.
